```{r}
#install.packages("BarcodingR")
library('BarcodingR')
library('ape')
install.packages("adegenet")
library('adegenet')

dna_ref <- fasta2DNAbin('clarki_barcodes_ref.fasta')
dna_query <- fasta2DNAbin('clarki_barcodes.fasta')

b.gap <- barcoding.gap(dna_query, dist = "raw")

b.gap

your_list <- list(
  c("inter", "intra"),
  structure(c(0.016717325, 0.023556231, 0.031914894, 0.035136778, 0.048632219, 0.056231003, 
    0.000000000, 0.001519757, 0.001519757, 0.002184650, 0.003039514, 0.006079027)
),
            .Names = c("Min.", "1st Qu.", "Median", "Mean", "3rd Qu.", "Max.", 
                       "Min.", "1st Qu.", "Median", "Mean", "3rd Qu.", "Max."))


# Convert the list to a data frame
your_data_frame <- as.data.frame(do.call(cbind, your_list))

write.csv(your_data_frame, file ="distance_output.csv")
```
